Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Greetings. I am a traveler of sorts, searching the lands for curios and curiosities. $Actor_22$ is my name and I would entreat your aid.]
[Name:IntroYes][Text:Oh. How interesting. In that case, you should speak with $2$, he and his husband make excellent weapons.]
[Name:Insects][Text:I was speaking to the insects in the forest last night. They didn't have anything interesting to say, but they're good listeners.][Default]
[Name:Strange People][Text:I've been alone for quite some time you know. Being around people agian is... strange, but exhilarating. You are all so very strange.][Default]
[Text:Is that for me? Oh! Thank you! It's just what I've been looking for! How did you know?][Name:Collection]

[Name:Task_10_Start][Text:I have spent years studying ancient texts that pre-date the war. They were scattered, hard to find and difficult to understand. I would build an $WorldObject_30$ here to better record our history. This land has a sense of importance about it and I feel that this task is of the utmost importance. Should warfare come again, greater than the last, we must prepare to preserve our knowledge for the future.][UnlockObjectID:30]
[Text:Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.][Name:JoinPartyNo]
